Package fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl

Class NodeFactoryAdapter

java.lang.Object
fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.NodeFactoryAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
NodeFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
GraphFactoryAdapter, SimpleTreeFactory
public abstract class NodeFactoryAdapter extends Object implements NodeFactory
A default abstract implementation of NodeFactory. Use it for further specialisation, for example for Tree factories.
Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 16 mai 2019

  • Method Details

    • nodeClassName

      public final String nodeClassName​(Class<? extends Node> nodeClass)
      Description copied from interface: NodeFactory
      Factories may use labels (= just Strings), as aliases for Node descendant class names. This method returns the label of a node class as known by this factory.
      Specified by:
      nodeClassName in interface NodeFactory
      Parameters:
      nodeClass - the node class
      Returns:
      the node class label recorded in this factory. Defaults to Class.getSimpleName().

    • nodeClass

      public final Class<? extends Node> nodeClass​(String label)
      Description copied from interface: NodeFactory
      Factories may use labels (= just Strings), as aliases for Node descendant class names. This method returns the class type matching a node label. Default behaviour is to pretend that label is a class name in the package fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.
      Specified by:
      nodeClass in interface NodeFactory
      Parameters:
      label - the label to get the class associated to it
      Returns:
      the class name matching the label argument
